book.title: Wordsworth
book.description: 简介： I cannot, perhaps, more fitly begin this short biography than with some words in which its subject has expressed his own feelings as to the spirit in which such a task should be approached. Silence, says Wordsworth, is a privilege of the grave, a rig...
